arts.ttl: Barcelona fans continue to take aim at 2 players despite win over Athletic Club
arts.sum: Supporters of La Liga giants Barcelona have on Wednesday taken firm aim at two leading members of the club’s first-team ranks. This comes owing to developments in Barcelona’s meeting with…

arts.ttl: Yamal and Gavi lead Barcelona to 2-0 win over Atheltic Bilbao and into Spanish Super Cup final
arts.sum: Lamine Yamal and Gavi Páez scored to lead Barcelona past Athletic Bilbao 2-0 and into the Spanish Super Cup final on Wednesday. Gavi scored in the 17th minute of the semifinal for his first goal since the midfielder returned to playing in October after a serious leg injury that sidelined him for nearly a year.

arts.ttl: Athletic Club 0-2 Barcelona: Player ratings as Gavi & Yamal strikes see Catalans into Supercopa final
arts.sum: Player ratings from the contest between Athletic Club and Barcelona in La Liga.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star joins Ronaldo & more in history books in Athletic Club clash
arts.sum: Barcelona starlet Gavi has on Wednesday night etched his name into the history books of Spanish football. As much comes owing to the midfielder’s exploits during Barcelona’s meeting with Athletic…

arts.ttl: Barcelona star benched vs Athletic Club as punishment by Hansi Flick

arts.ttl: Official: Hansi Flick makes major call as Barcelona XI to face Athletic Club in Super Cup unveiled
arts.sum: The XI of players set to be depended upon by Barcelona to get the better of La Liga rivals Athletic Club has on Wednesday evening been unveiled. And it features…

arts.ttl: Barcelona possible lineup against Athletic Club today in the Spanish Super Cup
arts.sum: Hansi Flick hinted at his side for the Spanish Super Cup semi-final against Athletic with the minutes he gave out in the Copa del Rey match against Barbastro, where players like Gavi, Cubarsí, Raphinha and Casadó were rested, as well as Lamine Yamal. In attack, Flick has a Lewandowski who scored again against Barbastro and has back Lamine Yamal and Raphinha, who also did not travel for the Copa del Rey and are well rested.

arts.ttl: Clásico rivals brace for extra chaos in January frenzy: Real Madrid and Barcelona find out Copa fate
arts.sum: The draw for the Copa del Rey round of 16 takes place on Wednesday (January 8), with Real Madrid and Barcelona set to learn their opponents as they continue their push to win multiple trophies in 2024/25. Additionally, Madrid will take part in the new-and-improved FIFA Club World Cup in the summer of 2025, which means they could end the season with seven trophies.
